title: FREE STYLING
content:
Bank Holiday plans in the works? Or winging it last minute? Give us any excuse to plan a few potential outfits and we’re on it. We’ve thought through what situations we may find ourselves in this Bank Holiday and styled up some outfits, so whatever the weather and whatever the occasion, you’ll be sure to look on fleeeeek this weekend!

Day Trippin’

Going out for the day with friends or family? Hitting up a beer garden (weather permitting) or shopping ’til you drop? Well bring the sunshine with you with a yellow sleeveless duster. Keep it casual with ripped denim and a basic tee, but dress it up with some heels and a little fringing!

Picknickin’

We’re bringing back the old school, sitting in the park, chilling in the sun picnic! Pack yourself a hamper of the best treats, work in some tribal love and layer it up with some tassel shorts, add a cute heel and a slouchy bag to fit your picnic blanket in! Top it off with a hat, for those afternoon snoozes outta the sun!

On the Barbie

Braving that standard British BBQ weather to whack some burgers on the grill and have a good time? Never fear, whether you’re in the garden, or end up stuck in the kitchen, look on-point in a playsuit! Add a cropped denim jacket to keep the cold at bay, whack some booties on your feet and flowers in your hair and you’re ready to go!

Dancing Queen

Put on your dancing shoes because you’re ready to party all night long! Pair the perfect dress with some killer heels and a clutch and you’ll be busting some serious moves on those dancefloors!

Beach Please

When we say prepared, we MEAN prepared. If the suns out, so are we, and we’re heading to the beach! Be British beach ready with a strappy mauve co-ord, cool shades, babein’ backpack and some amazing platforms! Don’t forget to pack a jumper…just in case!

title: FEELING MYSELF
content:
Can we just take a minute to discuss Beyonce and Nicki Minaj? So we totes knew they were chilling together at ‘chella, but we did NOT expect this super sassy hot video collab for Nicki’s new tune “Feeling Myself” which features Mrs Carter herself.

So what’s good about it? Well besides the obvious outfit envy Bey and Nicki inspire, it’s got just about everything you could want from a music video!

1. Paddling pools, inflatable pool toys, water guns and fluffy coats

As you can see, this video is in abundance of all those necessary items you’ll need in your back garden to thoroughly enjoy summer. Basically, these two are showing you how it’s done, and while we know this is filmed in Coachella, who’s to say it won’t get warm enough for us to whack out our paddling pools this summer?

2. Double Trouble

We’re ALL about girl power, which is why we’re loving this duo!

3. Bouncy castles, burgers, and fries

Who doesn’t love a bouncy castle and a McDonald’s? I mean, we’re not jealous that they can eat that and still look that good…not at all…cheeseburger for one please?

4. It inspires Coachella related envy

Need we say more?

5. Queen Bey being Queen Bey

Chilling in a Chicago Bulls swimsuit, filling a pickup truck with water and making it her own personal pool, looking incredible. Need we say more?

6. The absolute boss lady 90’s vibes

Seriously. Are you guys forming a group and if so, where can we sign up?!?!

Shop the Story

Feeling the blues? Never fear, just make sure your festival outfit is as good as Bey and Nicki’s by shopping our festival edit!
